member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument
member.summary: Provides access to the cached data and customization information in a document or workbook that is part of a document-level customization created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using a byte array that represents the document to be loaded and the file name extension of the document.
member.param: A byte array that represents the document to be loaded.
The file name extension of the document that is stored in the parameter, preceded by a period (.)—for example, ".xlsx" or ".docx".
member.exception: The parameter is null or empty.-or-The parameter is null or empty or consists entirely of white space characters.
The parameter specifies a file name extension that is not supported by the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime.
The file specified by has a customization that was not created with the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime or the Visual Studio Tools for the Microsoft Office system (version 3.0 Runtime).

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String)

member.param: A stream that represents the document to be loaded.
The file name extension of the document that is stored in the parameter, preceded by a period (.)—for example, ".xlsx" or ".docx".
member.exception: The parameter is null or empty.-or-The parameter is null or empty or consists entirely of white space characters.
The parameter has zero length or its current position is at the stream's end.
The parameter specifies a file name extension that is not supported by the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime.
The file specified by has a customization that was not created with the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime or the Visual Studio Tools for the Microsoft Office system (version 3.0 Runtime).
